extends java.awt.EventQueue

      An absolutely guru API, please avoid using it at all cost.

      void blockNextEvents(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e, IdeEventQueue.BlockMode blockMode)
      When blockMode is COMPLETE, blocks following related mouse events completely, when blockMode is ACTIONS only blocks performing actions bound to corresponding mouse shortcuts.

      • blockNextEvents

        public void blockNextEvents(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e,
                            IdeEventQueue.BlockMode blockMode)
        When blockMode is COMPLETE, blocks following related mouse events completely, when blockMode is ACTIONS only blocks performing actions bound to corresponding mouse shortcuts.

      • unsafeNonblockingExecute

        public static void unsafeNonblockingExecute(java.lang.Runnable r)
        Must be called on the Event Dispatching thread. Executes the runnable so that it can perform a non-blocking invocation on the toolkit thread. Not for general-purpose usage.
        Parameters:
        r - the runnable to execute
